snippet.title: Podcast Outtake: The 5 Paths to Effective Activism
snippet.description:
Is "faux activism" actually doing more harm than good? WatchMojo founder Ashkan Karbasfrooshan breaks down the "5 Paths to Advocacy," explaining why profile picture changes and street protests often miss the mark. Learn the strategy of "Corporate Governance Jujitsu"—a method of targeting boards and CEOs to force real accountability from global brands and institutions. Using examples from the Iran conflict to corporate giants like Sephora and RBC, we explore how to move from selective outrage to effective execution.

Watch the full episode here: https://youtube.com/live/0oakSs-OBD4?feature=share
